item.title: Chris add a quote by Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings
item.description:
"You know what I wisht I had, Ma? A pouch like a 'possum, to tote things.
--The Yearling" -- Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings

item.title: Chris add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I choose my friends for their good looks, my acquaintances for their good characters, and my enemies for their good intellects." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Chris add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Quotation is a serviceable substitute for wit." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Chris add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Consistency is the hallmark of the unimaginative." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Chris add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "People, generally, suck." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Chris add a quote by Brenda Ueland
item.description: "The imagination needs moodling,--long, inefficient happy idling, dawdling and puttering. " -- Brenda Ueland

item.title: Chris add a quote by P.G. Wodehouse
item.description:
"[A]lways get to the dialogue as soon as possible. I always feel the thing to go for is speed. Nothing puts the reader off more than a big slab of prose at the start."
(Interview, <i>The Paris Review</i>, Issue 64, Winter 1975)" -- P.G. Wodehouse

item.title: Chris add a quote by Cuthbert Soup
item.description: "When Danger Lurks and your heart is racing, don't be afraid be amazing" -- Cuthbert Soup

item.title: Chris add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Time is an illusion." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I speak to everyone in the same way, whether he is the garbage man or the president of the university." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Coincidence is God's way of remaining anonymous." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "A clever person solves a problem. A wise person avoids it." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Never memorize something that you can look up." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If a cluttered desk is a sign of a cluttered mind, of what, then, is an empty desk a sign?" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Einstein
item.description: "Once you can accept the universe as matter expanding into nothing that is something, wearing stripes with plaid comes easy." -- Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Creativity is intelligence having fun." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "It is not that I'm so smart. But I stay with the questions much longer." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Everything must be made as simple as possible. But not simpler." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Whoever is careless with the truth in small matters cannot be trusted with important matters" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Love is a better master than duty." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The intuitive mind is a sacred gift and the rational mind is a faithful servant. We have created a society that honors the servant and has forgotten the gift." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "God did not create evil. Just as darkness is the absence of light, evil is the absence of God." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Genius is 1% talent and 99% percent hard work..." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chris add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "A ship is always safe at the shore - but that is NOT what it is built for." -- Albert Einstein
